text:
Hey Aanchal!

I discuss the use of the Statistics component but it would unfortunately not fit for our case eventhough I see why you suggested it - so thanks for that!

If I could make a wish for the ProgressBar Component, it would be an optional label that, if set, overwrites the value of showPercentage. That way we would have the flexibility we would need without breaking previous versions of the ProgressBar.

For the CrmReport component are ther any plans to open it up past the Single Object Report? I would like to do some more complicated reports like email opens over time per business unit but that is not available as a single object report.
